attributes.action: the reduction of pay to footballers and increase of pay to soldiers
attributes.additional_details:
i am writing this petition to demand the change to the wages of soldiers and footballers.

you have footballers giving 90 minutes for their country and then you have soldiers giving their lives so that every one can have a life to live.

yet you have footballers walking round earning hundreds of thousands a week and then you have soldiers giving their lives fr the freedom of their country and that of others and the vast majority are only being paid a few hundred pounds a month.

so i am asking.no demanding that the wages are changed to give soldiers more for what they do for their country
